description: Dr. H. K. Agarwal is a specialist with over three decades of experience in the sphere of clinical, non-invasive, and interventional cardiology. He had been practicing at Max Healthcare for the past 18 years and has successfully treated a large number of patients with heart-related disorders. His expertise encompasses everything related to cardiac treatments, including coronary angiography, pacemaker implantation, and critical coronary care. Dr. Agarwal is a sensitive and personalized treatment provider in the treatment of serious heart diseases and always follows the best treatment for his patients as per their requirements.
